# speak-time.ps1 - Speaks the current time by text-to-speech (TTS)

speak-time.ps1

## Syntax & Parameters
```powershell

```

```
[<CommonParameters>]

    WarningVariable, OutBuffer, PipelineVariable, and OutVariable.
```

## Example
```powershell
PS>./speak-time
```
